description: Manage throughput of SQL database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database throughput migrate
commands.summary: Migrate the throughput of the SQL database between autoscale and manually provisioned.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql database throughput migrate --account-name
                                            --name
                                            --resource-group
                                            --throughput-type {autoscale, manual}

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database throughput show
commands.summary: Get the throughput of the SQL database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql database throughput show --account-name
                                         --name
                                         --resource-group

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database throughput update
commands.summary: Update the throughput of the SQL database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql database throughput update --account-name
                                           --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--max-throughput]
                                           [--throughput]
